// ACTION TYPE SET_USER_FIELD
export var SET_RESEARCH_FIELD='SET_RESEARCH_FIELD';// ACTION CREATOR setUserField
export var setResearchField=function setResearchField(value,name){return{type:SET_RESEARCH_FIELD,name:name,value:value};};// ACTION TYPE SET_USER_FIELD
export var SEARCH='SEARCH';// ACTION CREATOR changeModalState
export var search=function search(name){return{type:SEARCH,name:name};};// ACTION TYPE SET_SEARCH_RESULTS
export var SET_SEARCH_RESULTS='SET_SEARCH_RESULTS';// ACTION CREATOR setSearchResults
export var setSearchResults=function setSearchResults(list){return{type:SET_SEARCH_RESULTS,list:list};};
